title: VibeDuck
description: A playlist generator built on the Spotify API. Lets the users create playlists based on songs, artists, genres and/ or a variety of parameters.

title: Ziggato
description: A Discord bot with a range of utility features such as currency conversion, translation, Wikipedia integration, Steam integration and more. Hosted on a Node server.

title: ViaFilter
description: A very simple Chrome extension for the web streaming service Viaplay. It lets the user filter movies within a range of years.
